description:
A boy member of CGS, and the leader of the boys until Orga joined. While physically and intellectually gifted, his impulsiveness renders him somewhat unlikable. Unhappy at having his position usurped by Orga, he begins to nurture a grudge.
2nd season:The deputy leader of Tekkadan. During battle, he sometimes takes command in Orga`s place. Lately he has been reading strategy guidebooks to take the load off his leader. His ability to pilot ships using the Alaya-Vijnana system is quite remarkable.
Source: en.gundam.info
name: Eugene Sevenstark
